name: Calibre-TF201
short_description:
Your Android-Device isn't recognized by Calibre?
No problem!

With this tool you can transfer files from Calibre to your device as easily like you did it when Calibre makes it itself.

Just extraxt the downloaded file and doubleclick the program.


Behind this program is a lot of work. So I would be really grateful, if you could show me if there are some bugs and leave a little review :D
summary: Transfering files from Calibre to Android-devices
